description:
This series is a newly original animation that is going to form a new Yu-Gi-Oh! history. The story starts in Domino City many years after the legend of Yugi Mutou and other people. It`s an adventure in such a developed world and involves evolved duel disks.
The main feature of Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D`s is at the theme of animation, the future world of Domino City. It`s such a modern town with high-tech residents, skyscrapers, stadiums, and even dueling system. This city is called Neo Domino City. Riding Duel is a new dueling system introduced in this series. It is a speed duel applying the latest high-tech motorcycle with duel disks called D Wheel. The duelists are competing in Riding Duel that still focuses on card game with new master rules.

REGULAR.description:
Hoping to save his friends from the clutches of Sector Security, Yusei Fudo challenges his old nemesis Officer Ushio to a Riding Duel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On Your Mark, Get Set, Duel!
ライディング・デュエル! アクセラレーション!

REGULAR.description:
With his Duel Runner on the line, Yusei finds himself dueling against a bully who battles with a deck full of bugs.

titles.title: Power Insect Deck! Arijigoku no Wana

Looking to get his Stardust Dragon card back from Jack Atlas, Yusei takes off in a race against timeÃ‰ and Sector Security.

Misty traps Akiza in a Hall of Mirrors, actually duelling her through the mirrors.

Six months after the battle between the Dark Signers and the Signers, a large stone tablet falls from space and lands on Earth, just outside of New Domino City.

titles.title: ポッポタイムの古時計

REGULAR.description: Yusei receives a letter asking for his help in saving his good friend, Kalin Kesler. Immediately, Yusei heads to the town, where Kalin is staying. In the town ruled by dueling, Yusei sees Kalin completely defeating his opponent. Yusei tries calling out to Kalin, but all he gets is a cold reply.

Yusei Fudo ventures to bring Kalin Kesler back, but he dared to be on the side of the guy opposing Kalin. Yusei tries to tell Kalin that he came to help him. However, all Kalin gives him is a cold reply. Thus, the Duel between Yusei and Kalin begins.

titles.title: Rescue Kiryu! The Town of Wandering Duelists
鬼柳救出! さまよえる決闘者

REGULAR.description: Yusei and Kalin continue their duel. Kalin wants to be free from dueling by losing to Yusei. However, he is unable to betray the duel, and ultimately summons Infernity Death Dragon and makes his move on Yusei. However, Yusei summons Stardust Dragon to oppose Kalin. Yusei declares to him, "I am going to save you!".

titles.title: Shouri no Saki ni Aru Wana
The Trap Laid in Front of Victory
